text: Then I saw another powerful angel descending from heaven, wrapped in a cloud, with a rainbow above his head; his face was like the sun, and his legs were like pillars of fire.

He <st data-num="2192" class="">held</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> a <st data-num="974">little scroll</st> that was <st data-num="455" class="">open</st>, <st data-num="2532">and</st> he <st data-num="5087" class="">put</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="4228" class="">foot</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st> <st data-num="1161" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="2176" class="">left</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st>.

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> he <st data-num="2896" class="">shouted</st> in a <st data-num="3173" class="">loud</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="5618" class="">like</st> a <st data-num="3023" class="">lion</st> <st data-num="3455" class="">roaring</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> he <st data-num="2896" class="">shouted</st>, the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="1027" class="">thunders</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">sounded</st> <st data-num="1438" class="">their</st> <st data-num="5456" class="">voices</st>.

<st data-num="3753" class="">When</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="1027" class="">thunders</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st>, I was <st data-num="3195" class="">preparing</st> to <st data-num="1125" class="">write</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="1" /> just then<n id="2" /> I <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> a <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="3004" class="">say</st>, “<st data-num="4972">Seal up</st> <st data-num="3739" class="">what</st> the <st data-num="2033" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="1027" class="">thunders</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1125" class="">write</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st> <st data-num="1125" class="">down</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> I <st data-num="1492" class="">saw</st> <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st> <st data-num="142" class="">raised</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1188" class="">right</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="1519" class="">to</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st>

<st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3660" class="">swore</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">by</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> one who <st data-num="2198" class="">lives</st> <st data-num="1519 165">forever</st> and <st data-num="165" class="">ever</st>, <st data-num="3739" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2936" class="">created</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">what</st> is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="1093" class="">earth</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> what is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3588" class="">the</st> <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> what is <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, “There will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> <st data-num="3765">no more</st> <st data-num="5550" class="">delay</st>!<n id="1" />

<st data-num="235" class="">But</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="2250" class="">days</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="3752" class="">when</st> the <st data-num="1442" class="">seventh</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> is <st data-num="3195" class="">about</st> to <st data-num="4537" class="">blow</st> his <st data-num="4537" class="">trumpet</st>, the <st data-num="3466" class="">mystery</st> of <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> is <st data-num="5055" class="">completed</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613">just as</st> he has<n id="3" /> <st data-num="2097" class="">proclaimed</st> to <st data-num="1438" class="">his</st> <st data-num="1401" class="">servants</st><n id="4" /> the <st data-num="4396" class="">prophets</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">Then</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="5456" class="">voice</st> I had <st data-num="191" class="">heard</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> <st data-num="3772" class="">heaven</st> began to <st data-num="2980" class="">speak</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="3326" class="">to</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3825" class="">again</st>,<n id="4" /> “<st data-num="5217" class="">Go</st> and <st data-num="2983" class="">take</st> the <st data-num="455" class="">open</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="975" class="">scroll</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> of the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> who is <st data-num="2476" class="">standing</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="2281" class="">sea</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1909" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="1093" class="">land</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> I <st data-num="565" class="">went</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="32" class="">angel</st> and <st data-num="3004" class="">asked</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> to <st data-num="1325" class="">give</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st> the <st data-num="974" class="">little scroll</st>. He<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3004" class="">said</st> to <st data-num="1473" class="">me</st>, “<st data-num="2983">Take</st> the scroll<n id="3" /> and <st data-num="2719" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>. It<n id="4" /> will <st data-num="4087" class="">make</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2836" class="">stomach</st> <st data-num="4087" class="">bitter</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> it will <st data-num="1510" class="">be</st> as <st data-num="1099" class="">sweet</st> <st data-num="1099" class="">as</st> <st data-num="3192" class="">honey</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>.”

<st data-num="2532" class="">So</st><n id="1" /> I <st data-num="2983" class="">took</st> the <st data-num="974">little scroll</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="32">angel’s</st> <st data-num="5495" class="">hand</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="2719" class="">ate</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> it did taste<n id="2" /> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> <st data-num="1099" class="">sweet</st> as <st data-num="3192" class="">honey</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="4750" class="">mouth</st>, <st data-num="2532" class="">but</st><n id="3" /> <st data-num="3753" class="">when</st> I had <st data-num="2068">eaten</st> <st data-num="846" class="">it</st>, <st data-num="1473" class="">my</st> <st data-num="2836" class="">stomach</st> became <st data-num="4087" class="">bitter</st>.
Then they told me: “You must prophesy again about many peoples, nations, languages, and kings.”
